did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Highland County (Va.) Electoral Board Records, 1931-1952. Local government records collection, Highland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers Highland County, Va.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Highland County was named for its mountainous terrain. It was formed from Bath and Pendleton (West Virginia) Counties in 1847.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Highland County (Va.) Electoral Board Records, 1931-1952, these record includes Minutes and Proceedings.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Highland County records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm.

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Highland County
